author: beforeitsnews.com
title: The Truth About California’s Oroville Dam—Who Will Be Blamed, Why They Did It and What’s Happening! | Weather
text:
(Before It's News)
By Lisa Haven
Yesterday, February 13th, residents of Oroville, California were given a last minute directive to evacuate their homes due to concerns that the dam was going to fail. At this time, no one knows exactly when they will be able to return or if the dam will break, however there are some things that need to be addressed that the mainstream media refuses to tell you about this impending catastrophe.
Over 12 years ago governing authorities in California were warned that the Oroville Dam needed repairs, however they failed to do anything about it. Mishap after mishap went ignored and how California residences are faced with a nightmare scenario. Sadly, the mainstream lying media saying nothing about who is involved, what they were told, and why they did it. All that and more in this report…
